attributes.action: undergo a full and thorough psychological evaluation to ascertain whether he is mentally fit to lead the Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the increasingly erratic behaviour and mood swings/temper outbursts of the Prime Minister over recent weeks, at least according to various News sources, I believe that he should be required to undergo an independent and comprehensive mental health examination to see whether he is in a fit state to lead the Government at this time of national crisis.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
